div.pre: 1911 Reggio, Chiesa Pepe, Bruttium, 1913 (857) Burial: c. 387 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: c. 97 AR. Pot hoard Rhegium: 7 tetradr. (to Herzfelder 92) Acragas: 1 tetradr. Catana: 1 tetradr. (facing Apollo hd., possibly intrusive) Gela: 4 tetradr. (to Jenkins 392) Himera: 1 tetradr. Leontini: 6 tetradr. Messana: 9 tetradr. Selinus: 1 tetradr. Syracuse: 35 tetradr. (to Tudeer 86-7) Athens: 3 tetradr. (5th cent. type) Unidentified: 2 tetradr. Disposition: Reggio 70 Putorti, NSc 1914, pp. 159-60; BLM 1913, 5411 Jenkins, Gela, p. 157
